!Library of Sages Director Sophia: I remember this book. The Priest of the Earth, Chichirin who is now in Dwarven Village gave this book to me after putting gum in my hair. And though it is unlike me, I lost it and my hairbrush one sunny afternoon.... ...Hey, do you believe in coincidence? Cause' I don't! I think you should return this book to Priest of the Earth, Chichirin in Dwarven Village for me.
